colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(CES DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO ZHI BA'I RNAM 'GYUR GYI GTOR CHOG BAR CHAD KUN 'JOMS BYA BA 'DI YANG, GUS PHRAN BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL RMONGS BAN GYI NA BAS ^SRID ZHI'I 'GRO BA YONGS KYI SKYABS MGON BLA NA MA MCHIS PA RDO RJE 'CHANG PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN GZIGS CHEN POR CHOS RGYAL 'DI NYID KYI GTOR CHOG BKA' RTZOM BSKUL MA ZHUS PA'I PHYIR PHEBS SU KHYOD KYIS RTZOM ZHIG ZHES PHEBS PAR, BKA' BZHIN BSGRUBS PA'I MCHOD PAR DMIGS NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS TE PHUL BA LAGS NA, GTOR CHOG 'DI NYID BLA MA YI DAM CHOS BSRUNG MNYES PA'I MCHOD SPRIN DU GYUR BAR BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA DANG, BLO BZANG THUB DBANG RDO RJE 'CHANG DNGOS SKYABS MGON KHYED RIGS LDAN DRAG PO 'KHOR LO CAN GYI SKUR BZHENGS PA'I DUS PHRAN 'KHOR GYI THOG MAR CIS KYANG RJES SU 'DZIN PA MDZAD DU GSOL,, ,,)
